title: Crow
intro: A tamed crow. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.

title: Dog
intro: A traveler's best friend.

title: Lesser Red Slime
intro: A tamed red slime. It is not very powerful, but may assist you in battle with fire magic.

title: Lesser Slime
intro: A tamed slime. It is not very powerful, but may assist you in battle.

title: Bat
intro: A tamed bat. It can drain HP from your enemies in battle.

title: Bear
intro: A wild bear. It will frequently attack your enemies.

title: Evil Eye
intro: A strange floating eye. It seems to know rudimentary magic.

title: Lesser Golem
intro: A tamed golem. It will cast protection on you in battle.

title: Snake
intro: A tamed snake. Occasionally, it can poison your opponents in battle.

title: Wolf
intro: A tamed wolf. It will often attack your enemies in battle.

title: Draugr Mage
intro: A draugr of certain magical ability.

title: Fairy
intro: A magic fairy. It will heal you in battle.

title: Ghost
intro: A spooky ghost. It may put your opponent to sleep.

title: Gnome
intro: A gnome. It can assist you in battle with its spells.

title: Hellhound
intro: A tamed hellhound. Can assist in battle with attacks and fire magic.

title: Imp
intro: A tamed imp. Will occasionally boost your attack.

title: Lizarr
intro: A tamed, yet aggressive lizarr warrior. It will attack your enemies in battle.

title: Lobster
intro: A lobster. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.

title: Mimic
intro: A mimic. What it is capable of is unknown.

title: Zu
intro: A tamed Zu. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.

title: Alfar
intro: A small follower of Scruug. Available for a limited time only.

title: Cactus
intro: A live cactus. It can assist you in battle with barrages of needles.

title: Drake
intro: A tamed Drake. It will occasionally summon meteor against your enemies.

title: Fae
intro: A great magic fairy. It will cure your status effects in battle.

title: Gazer
intro: The storied gazer. It utilizes lightning magic in battle.

title: Great Bear
intro: A very mighty bear. It can lend you its might, but at the cost of your defenses.

title: Horse
intro: A trusty steed. It can assist one in battle with offensive skills and boosts to one's dexterity.

title: Living Armor
intro: An animated piece of armor. It will help in party combat by drawing enemy attention to you while recovering Ward.

title: Living Dagger
intro: An animated dagger. It will attack frequently with a magical blade.

title: Living Hammer
intro: An animated hammer. It will attack frequently with a magical hammer face.

title: Living Sword
intro: An animated sword. It will attack frequently with a magical blade.

title: Seer
intro: A seer of Ra. It can blind an opponent in battle.

intro: Available for a limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always lit ablaze.

title: Wisp
intro: A strange floating ball of energy. It is quite proficient at healing its allies.
